page.description: A list of calender component properties.

case.title: Show Day View
case.description: The Day view shows events for a specific date.

case.title: Show Week View
case.description: The Week view displays events for a certain week. Events are displayed within vertical timelines. If you have an "All Day" event, it will be displayed at the top of the "Week" view.

case.title: Show Month View
case.description: Month view displays events for a particular month. Only a few events for a given date are displayed. Other events are hidden and are shown when a "View All" link is clicked.

case.title: Show Custom View
case.description: Month view displays events for a particular month. Only a few events for a given date are displayed. Other events are hidden and are shown when a "View All" link is clicked.

case.title: Show Agenda View
case.description: Agenda view displays events in a list view. They are grouped by a day. You can scroll backwards and forwards to view your list of events.

case.title: Show Work Week View
case.description: The Work-Week View displays events for the working days in a particular week (monday thru friday)

case.title: Show Workshift View
case.description: Workshift view displays events / task for a person. Persons can be grouped. For example: they can be grouped by departments like Managers, Sales, Trainers, etc.

case.title: Show Groups/Events View
case.description: The Groups / Events view displays groups on x axis and events on vertical timelines. Groups could represent Persons or a Resource like Conference Rooms.

case.title: Set calendar to read only
case.description: If the calendar is set to read only, the user cannot add new events or drag and drop to change events. The grids may still be used to modify events unless they are also set to read only.

case.title: Default view
case.description: Default view displayed when the calendar is initialized and loaded.

case.title: First day of week
case.description: Defines the start day of the week, either Sunday or Monday.

case.title: Time zone offset in hours
case.description: Offset(if required) from GMT in hours. The default value is 0.

case.title: Default language
case.description: The calendar currently supports English, French, Italian and Spanish

section.title: Referenced Grids and Modal Dialog Size

case.title: New event grid name
case.description: Select a grid to display when adding a new event to the calendar. This grid will be displayed in a modal popup window when the user adds an event to the calendar by a click and drag event.

case.title: Update event grid name
case.description: Select a grid to display when updating an event. This grid will be displayed in a modal pupup window when the user clicks on an existing event.

case.title: Popup grid window width
case.description: Specify the required width of the modal popup window that contains the new event and update event grids.

case.title: Popup grid window height
case.description: Specify the required height of the modal popup window that contains the new event and update event grids.

case.name: Calendar license code
case.description: Enter a valid calendar license code. The calendar is licensed per domain.
